resources.string:
Open the survey on another device.

Read the instructions on the first page of the survey. 

Wear headphones. 

Make sure to be concentrated on the task without distractions. 

When you feel ready, swipe from right to left to start.

This is the button section that shows 4 buttons with different vibration patterns. 
The first button gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the "button 1" and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to "button 2" and so on until "button 4". 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.

This is the slider section that shows 4 sliders with different vibration patterns. 
The first slider gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the first slider and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to the second one and so on until the last one. 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.

This is the checkbox section that shows 4 checkboxes with different vibration patterns. 
The first one gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the first checkbox by selecting and deselecting it and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to the second one and so on until the last one. 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.

This is the toggle section that shows 4 toggles with different vibration patterns. 
The first one gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the first toggle by turning it on and off and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to the second one and so on until the last one. 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.

This is the spinner section that shows 4 spinners with 3 elements each and different vibration patterns. 
The first spinner gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 
The already selected elements if selected again give no feedback. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the first spinner by selecting items and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to the second one and so on until the last one. 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.

This is the rating section that shows 4 rating bars with different vibration patterns. 
The first one gives no feedback and it is not part of the survey. 

When you feel ready, start to interact with the first rating bar and answer the questions related to it. 
Then, move to the second one and so on until the last one. 
When you have finished to answer the questions related to this section, move to the next page by swiping from right to left.
You have done! \nRemember to submit the survey!
Thank you very much for you time, \nyour answers will be helpful!

Alessandro Iop 〉 iop@kth.se 
Federico Landorno 〉 landorno@kth.se 
DH2670 Haptics, Tactile and Tangible Interaction 
Interactive Media Technology 
KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
